title: What's the difference between iPhone 12 Max, iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro Max? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, there is no iPhone 12 Max. There are, however, four different iPhone 12 models with different sizes. From Smallest to Largest: iPhone 12 Mini - 2.53 x 0.29 in. (5.4 in screen)iPhone 12 - 5.78 x 2.82 x 0.29 in. (6.1 in screen)iPhone 12 Pro - 5.78 x 2.82 x 0.29 in. (6.1 in screen) - same size as standard iPhone 12iPhone 12 Pro Max - 6.33 x 3.07 x 0.29 in. (6.7 in screen)The non-pro models have two rear cameras and one front facing camera while the pro models have three rear cameras and front facing camera. The pro models also have a feature called a LIDAR scanner which uses infrared to map out areas around the user. While the exact battery sizes and RAM were not revealed by Apple, it is expected that the Pro Models will have more in both of those departments than the non-pro models. iPhone 12's four models compared: Differences between iPhone 12, Pro, Pro Max and Mini

The basic iPhone is made from aircraft-grade aluminum, while the Pro variant is made from stainless steel. The amount of RAM is different - the iPhone 12 has only 4 GB of RAM, while the iPhone 12 Pro has 6 GB. A simple iPhone can be purchased with 64, 128, or 256 GB of flash memory. iPhone 12 Pro comes with 128GB, 256GB, or 512GB storage. Both the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro look pretty much the same, here is a comparison of these two models focused on its photography features:  The main difference is the cameras - iPhone 12 has a dual camera (wide-angle module and ultra-wide, both 12 megapixels), while the iPhone 12 Pro has a triple camera (wide, ultra-wide, and telephoto, all 12 megapixels) with a LiDAR sensor (laser rangefinder, useful for augmented reality applications). Here is a detailed overview of their feature from a professional photographer's point of view.:

Assuming the rumors are true, there will actually be 4 phones in Fall 2020. the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Max are your default mass market phones, the difference being screen size. The 2 Pro phones are more expensive and their difference is also screen size. There are a lot of Youtube videos going over all these in more detail.
None of these phones exist so there is no difference between them. Just Google Mac Rumors if you want speculation.
The size of the phone the 12 is small the pro is a regular size and the pro max is the bigger one
